sentences.english: Christian dedication and faithfulness in worshiping, studying the Word, receiving the sacrament.
sentences.chinese: 在做禮拜，學習聖經，領聖餐時基督徒的奉獻和忠誠。

sentences.english: More than 550 priests were on hand to distribute  communion to the participants.
sentences.chinese: 有550多個祭司當時在那裏給神父在分發聖餐。

sentences.english: Mormons administer the sacrament of the Lord's Supper as a memorial of Christ's death.
sentences.chinese: 摩門教徒將聖餐之禮看作對基督之死的紀念。

sentences.english: Mysteries The consecrated elements of the Eucharist.
sentences.chinese: 聖體聖餐中被奉爲神聖的成分。

sentences.english: The blade and chalice guarding o'er her gates.
sentences.chinese: 劍刃和聖餐杯守護在她的門外。

sentences.english: Next week is his First Communion.
sentences.chinese: 下星期它就可以首次領聖餐了。

sentences.english: Why did you eat the Lord’s Supper?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼要領受主的聖餐呢？

sentences.english: The other sacrament is Holy Communion. In some churches it is called the Lord's Supper.
sentences.chinese: 另一個聖禮儀式是守聖餐，有些教會也稱之爲主餐。

sentences.english: The communion service is almost like a regular visit to Calvary.
sentences.chinese: 信徒守聖餐，就仿如定時到各各他山上去紀念主一樣。

sentences.english: Church of England at sixes and sevens over child communion.
sentences.chinese: 英國教會在兒童聖餐禮方面意見不統一。

sentences.english: The sacrament of the Eucharist received by a congregation.
sentences.chinese: 聖餐某地區全體教徒接受聖餐的聖禮。

sentences.english: The sacrament of the Eucharist received by a congregation.
sentences.chinese: 聖餐某地區全體教徒接受聖餐的聖禮。

sentences.english: The minister invites the people to the Lord's table and then gives thanks to God.
sentences.chinese: 牧師邀請信徒同來到聖餐桌前，然後爲聖餐祝謝。

sentences.english: The minister invites the people to the Lord's table and then gives thanks to God.
sentences.chinese: 牧師邀請信徒同來到聖餐桌前，然後爲聖餐祝謝。

sentences.english: They deny the real presence in the Lord's Supper.
sentences.chinese: 他們否認聖餐中聖體同在。

sentences.english: Near the end of the Mass Benedict walked down from the altar to distribute Holy Communion.
sentences.chinese: 在彌撒快結束時，教皇本篤走下神壇分發聖餐。

definition: to eat one's fill/to be full
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
hand-mixed drink (of the kind sold at a bubble tea shop)
SS or Schutzstaffel, paramilitary organization in Nazi Germany
to rack one's brains for schemes (idiom)/to beat one's brains out
